ctx: intros a b Q Ha Hb.
induction Q as [| p Q' IH].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet --: Current bullet -- is not finished.

ctx: intros a b Q Ha Hb.
induction Q as [| p Q' IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, p : poly A0 eqA ltM Q' : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Ha : Cb a (p :: addEnd b Q') Hb : Cb b (p :: Q') IH : Cb a (addEnd b Q') -> Cb b Q' -> Cb a Q' Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2199 ?M2200 ?M2202 ?M2203 ?M2206 ?M2209 ?M2210 ?M2211 ?M2212 ?M2218 ?M2214" with "(let (x, _) := a in fun Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x) (p :: Q')".

ctx: intros a b Q Ha Hb.
induction Q as [| p Q' IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a : list (Term A n)) (R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R a -> forall (b : poly A0 eqA ltM) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), R = b :: Q -> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) -> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} a, b, p : poly A0 eqA ltM Q' : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Ha : Cb a (p :: addEnd b Q') Hb : Cb b (p :: Q') IH : Cb a (addEnd b Q') -> Cb b Q' -> Cb a Q' M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) A1_diff_A0 : eqA A1 A0 -> False eqA_ref : reflexive A eqA eqA_sym : symmetric A eqA eqA_trans : transitive A eqA plusA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c)) (plusA (plusA a b) c) plusA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a) plusA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c d) plusA_A0 : forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0) invA_plusA : forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a)) invA_eqA_comp : forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b) minusA_def : forall a b : A, eqA (minusA a b) (plusA a (invA b)) multA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c d) multA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (multA a (multA b c)) (multA (multA a b) c) multA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a) multA_dist_l : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA (multA c a) (multA c b)) (multA c (plusA a b)) multA_A0_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0 multA_A1_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a divA_rew : forall (a b : A) (nZ1 nZ2 : eqA b A0 -> False), divA a b nZ1 = divA a b nZ2 divA_is_multA : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b) divA_eqA_comp : forall (a b c d : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZd : eqA d A0 -> False), eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c d nZd) divA_multA_comp_r : forall (a b c : A) (nZc : eqA c A0 -> False), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA (divA a c nZc) b) divA_invA_r : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZib : eqA (invA b) A0 -> False), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb)) Unable to unify "Cb a Q'" with "Cb a (p :: Q')".

: mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a : list (Term A n)) (R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} a, b, p : poly A0 eqA ltM Q' : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Ha : Cb a (p :: addEnd b Q') Hb : Cb b (p :: Q') IH : Cb a (addEnd b Q') -> Cb b Q' -> Cb a Q' M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) A1_diff_A0 : eqA A1 A0 -> False eqA_ref : reflexive A eqA eqA_sym : symmetric A eqA eqA_trans : transitive A eqA plusA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c)) (plusA (plusA a b) c) plusA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a) plusA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c d) plusA_A0 : forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0) invA_plusA : forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a)) invA_eqA_comp : forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b) minusA_def : forall a b : A, eqA (minusA a b) (plusA a (invA b)) multA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c d) multA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (multA a (multA b c)) (multA (multA a b) c) multA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a) multA_dist_l : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA (multA c a) (multA c b)) (multA c (plusA a b)) multA_A0_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0 multA_A1_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a divA_rew : forall (a b : A) (nZ1 nZ2 : eqA b A0 -> False), divA a b nZ1 = divA a b nZ2 divA_is_multA : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b) divA_eqA_comp : forall (a b c d : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZd : eqA d A0 -> False), eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c d nZd) divA_multA_comp_r : forall (a b c : A) (nZc : eqA c A0 -> False), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA (divA a c nZc) b) divA_invA_r : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZib : eqA (invA b) A0 -> False), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb)) original: intros a b Q Ha Hb. induction Q as [| p Q' IH]. -- simpl in Ha. simpl in Hb. auto. -- simpl in Ha. simpl. apply CombLinear_trans_cons_lem. + apply IH. apply Ha. + auto.
